title: 93/528/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 October 1993 repealing Decision 93/418/EEC concerning protection measures in relation to foot-and-mouth disease in Russia
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 October 1993 repealing Decision 93/418/EEC concerning protection measures in relation to foot-and-mouth disease in Russia
(93/528/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 October 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 62, 15. 3. 1993, p. 49.
(3) OJ No L 110, 4. 5. 1993, p. 36.
(4) OJ No L 234, 17. 9. 1993, p. 22.
(5) OJ No L 191, 31. 7. 1993, p. 129.
